name: .HDK File Extension
summary: Learn about .HDK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by HotDocs, a document preparation program; contains a publisher key required to register templates for commercial use with the HotDocs Player; provided to the customer by a HotDocs sales representative after purchase.

content: When you receive an HDK file, you should copy it to the HotDocs program installation folder. After it is copied, new program options are available when publishing template sets.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
